articles.title: Lionel Messi: Argentine corn field planted with face of World Cup winner
articles.description: Lionel Messi has been immortalized in Argentina in tributes ranging from tattoos to murals after leading the national team to win the soccer World Cup. Now, his face can be seen from the heavens too -- on a specially designed corn field.
articles.content:
Reuters —
Lionel Messi has been immortalized in Argentina in tributes ranging from tattoos to murals after leading the national team to win the soccer World Cup. Now, his face can be seen from the heavens too – on a specially designed corn field.

articles.title: ‘I miss my team-mates’: Lionel Messi shares nostalgic social media post about Argentina’s World Cup win
articles.description: "Obviously, being champions makes everything more beautiful, but what a beautiful month I had, how many beautiful memories I have and miss," Messi wrote on Instagram.
articles.content:
A month after Argentina’s historic FIFA World Cup win over France in Qatar, Lionel Messi has shared a nostalgic post on social media saying he misses his team-mates.
“Obviously, being champions makes everything more beautiful, but what a beautiful mo... [1003 chars]

articles.title: Sorry RRR, Argentina, 1985 is by far the best international film of the year
articles.description: Going into the untold atrocities of Argentina's last civil-military dictatorship from 1976 to 1983, Argentina, 1985 cuts into the mordant moral dilemma without any hint of self-righteousness.
articles.content: Santiago Mitre’s Argentina, 1985 resurrects our faith in the art of storytelling. It is a supremely relevant story that had to be told. And it doesn’t mince words. At the same time, this is an enormously engaging film, although it indulges in no gimm... [3101 chars]

articles.title: GRAINS-Soybeans, corn fall for second session on improved Argentine weather
articles.description: SINGAPORE, Jan 19 (Reuters) - Chicago soybean and corn futures slid for a second session on Thursday, as forecasts of much-needed rains in Argentina's crop belt eased some of the supply concerns resulting from a severe crop in the South American country.Wheat lost more ground, although slow pace of exports from the Black Sea region supported the market.FUNDAMENTALS* The

articles.title: Canada’s World Cup-bound men’s basketball team to play Spain, Argentina in friendlies
articles.description: Canada’s men’s basketball team to face Spain, Argentina this summer in preparation for World Cup
articles.content:
Canada’s men’s basketball team will play exhibition games against Spain and Argentina this summer in preparation for the 2023 FIBA World Cup.
